answers.answer: Specialist medical assistance involves specialist consultation and includes a basic package of services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: Specialized ambulatory medical assistance is provided in medical practices, health units, specialized and integrated outpatient clinics within hospitals, diagnostic and treatment medical centers, and palliative care clinics, all contracted by the health insurance company.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: The basic package includes medical services for emergency situations, curative services for acute conditions, consultations for chronic diseases, detection of endemic-epidemic diseases, family planning services, palliative care, diagnostic and therapeutic services, pregnancy surveillance, and medical services for diagnostic purposes.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: People coming from the war zones of Ukraine can receive specialized medical services without presenting a referral ticket or a prescription from a family doctor.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.

answers.answer: Patients with chronic conditions can benefit from a maximum of 4 consultations per quarter, or a maximum of 2 consultations per month.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.

answers.answer: After hospitalization, insured individuals can receive up to two free consultations for tracking the evolution of their condition, performing therapeutic procedures, wound examination, thread/cast removal after interventions, and recommendations for necessary paraclinical investigations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.

answers.answer: Remote specialist consultations are allowed for chronic conditions and for diseases with potential endemo-epidemic that require isolation.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.

answers.answer: Day hospitalization services, lasting less than 12 hours, combine clinical medical services and investigations, including examples like monitoring of normal or high-risk pregnancies, prenatal screening, and early detection of precancerous lesions of the breast or dysplastic lesions of the cervix.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: After consultations, a specialist doctor can decide on therapeutic conduct, prescribe treatment, recommend home care or medical devices, assess and monitor chronic conditions, issue referral tickets for other specialties, and issue medical leave certificates.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: A psychologist can provide psychological counseling and psychotherapy, as well as special psychopedagogical counseling through a speech therapist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Patients can access physiotherapist services through a recommendation from doctors with certain specializations, provided the outpatient clinic has qualified staff or a contract with a physiotherapy service provider.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Psychiatric therapies, along with services from a psychologist or speech therapist, can be provided remotely through any means of communication.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Patients with conditions or aggravations after COVID-19 can benefit from physical therapy, psychological counseling, and psychotherapy, through a recommendation from cardiology and pneumology doctors.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.
